mapper.sql: id, hostip, servername, port, title, rule, content, watchtime, jmxtime, date, server, message, subsystem, userid, severity, thread, msgid, machine, txid, contentid, timestamp
mapper.select: SELECT hostip FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT hostip FROM log) t ORDER BY hostip
SELECT port FROM (SELECT DISTINCT port FROM log WHERE hostip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) aa ORDER BY port
mapper.insert: insert into log (id, hostip, servername, port, title, rule, content, watchtime, jmxtime, date, server, message, subsystem, userid, severity, thread, msgid, machine, txid, contentid, timestamp ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hostip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{servername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{watchtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jmxtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{server,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subsystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{severity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thread,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{machine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update log
hostip = #{hostip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
servername = #{servername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
port = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rule = #{rule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
watchtime = #{watchtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jmxtime = #{jmxtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
date = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
server = #{server,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
severity = #{severity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
thread = #{thread,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
msgid = #{msgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
machine = #{machine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
txid = #{txid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contentid = #{contentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
timestamp = #{timestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update log set hostip = #{hostip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, servername = #{servername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, port = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rule = #{rule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, watchtime = #{watchtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jmxtime = #{jmxtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, date = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, server = #{server,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, message = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subsystem = #{subsystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, severity = #{severity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thread = #{thread,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msgid = #{msgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, machine = #{machine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, txid = #{txid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contentid = #{contentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, timestamp = #{timestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
